sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: File-&file-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: autoconf: autoconf, autoheader automake: aclocal, automake bash: sh binutils: as, ld diffutils: cmp fileutils: chmod, install, ln, ls, mv, rm, touch gcc: cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc grep: egrep, grep m4: m4 make: make mawk: mawk sed: sed sh-utils: echo, expr, hostname, sleep texinfo: makeinfo textutils: cat, tr
